backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with storage and authorization mixins plus types for content, users, products, packages, and site sections.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including components, pages, contexts, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base, components, and utilities setup with extensive light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and layout setup including landing page sections and admin login/dashboard routes.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Bilingual About section with statistics cards, icons, animations, and structured content.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Shows an access denied message with optional home navigation and link back to admin login.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentBlo: Admin tool for creating content blocks with text, images, ordering, and visibility settings for sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/Diagnostic: Runs diagnostic checks for authentication, admin status, product fetching, and product CRUD operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/HowToOrder: Admin interface to add or edit multilingual how‑to‑order steps with optional image uploads.
frontend/src/components/admin/InstagramF: Admin UI for viewing and updating Instagram feed settings including handle, embed code, titles, descriptions, visibility, and display order.
frontend/src/components/admin/PackagesMa: CRUD interface for managing packages with multilingual fields, pricing, image uploads, and edit/delete dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductsMa: Admin tool for creating, editing, and deleting products with multilingual fields, pricing, and image upload support.
frontend/src/components/admin/SectionsMa: Manages additional page sections with multilingual text, visibility, order, and image/background uploads.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact form with bilingual labels, toast notifications, social/contact info, and form state handling.
Renders dynamic, language-aware sections fetched from the backend, supporting backgrounds, images, and sortable content blocks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays site footer with branding, contact info, social links, and scroll-based navigation using translation strings.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides a responsive header with scrolling behavior, navigation links, language toggle, and admin access handling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Shows the hero section with background imagery, animated elements, translated text, and buttons that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/HowToOrder.tsx: Presents a translated step-by-step ordering guide with icons, cards, and a scroll-to-contact action.
frontend/src/components/InstagramFeed.ts: Loads Instagram feed configuration to display an embed or profile link, with fade-in animation and language-aware text.
frontend/src/components/Packages.tsx: Displays a grid of predefined package cards with images and translated titles, descriptions, and tags.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Renders a product gallery using a static product list, showing images and translated metadata in card layout.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a context for language selection and string translations between English and Spanish.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, products, and other backend-driven data using an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode colors, animations, and Instagram embed styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with the QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page handling admin checks, profile setup, logout, and rendering various administrative management panels.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page using Internet Identity authentication with admin verification and conditional redirects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color system via CSS variables, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, issues, and feature requests focused on fixing admin panel access and assigning admin roles based on Internet Identity principals.
